assetByTypeAndLatLonRadius: SELECT "id", CASE WHEN "imageName" IS NULL THEN $defaultImage ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"imageName") end as "imageName",CASE WHEN "animationName" IS NULL THEN $defaultAnimation ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"animationName") end as "animationName", "contractId","ownerId","assetLocation","price","assetName","assetType","seasonName","assetStatus","isActive",ROUND(earth_distance(ll_to_earth ($lat, $lon), ll_to_earth(lat, lon))::NUMERIC, 2) "distance","assetLocation",lat,lon,attributes from mv_object_mgmt.assets WHERE "assetType"=$assetType AND earth_box(ll_to_earth ($lat, $lon), $radius) @> ll_to_earth (lat, lon) AND earth_distance(ll_to_earth ($lat, $lon), ll_to_earth (lat, lon)) < $radius ORDER BY distance
countAssetByTypeAndLatLonRadius: SELECT count(id) "total" from mv_object_mgmt.assets WHERE "assetType"=$assetType AND earth_box(ll_to_earth ($lat, $lon), $radius) @> ll_to_earth (lat, lon) AND earth_distance(ll_to_earth ($lat, $lon), ll_to_earth (lat, lon)) < $radius
allAssets: SELECT  a."id",( $defaultImage|| a."imageName") as "imageName",( $defaultAnimation|| a."animationName") as "animationName",( $defaultSticker|| a."stickerName") as "stickerName",a."contractId",a."ownerId",a."description",a."assetLocation",a."price",a."assetName",a."assetType",a."seasonName",a."assetStatus",a."isActive",a."lat",a."lon",a."createdBy",a."updatedBy", a."attributes", c."name" as "collectionName" from mv_object_mgmt.assets a inner join mv_object_mgmt.contracts c on a."contractId"=c."id" ORDER BY a."id"
assetsByOwner: SELECT  "id",CASE WHEN "imageName" IS NULL THEN $defaultImage ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"imageName") end as "imageName",CASE WHEN "animationName" IS NULL THEN $defaultAnimation ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"animationName") end as "animationName","contractId","ownerId","assetLocation","price","assetName","assetType","seasonName","assetStatus","isActive","lat","lon","createdBy","updatedBy" from mv_object_mgmt.assets WHERE "ownerId"=$ownerId ORDER BY id
getAllContracts: select c.id,c."seasonName",c."assetType",c."contractAddress",c."contractAbi",c."blockNumber",c."isActive",c."createdBy",c."updatedBy",c."name",c."description",( $imgPath||c."logoImage") as "logoImage",( $imgPath||c."featuredImage") as "featuredImage",( $imgPath||c."bannerImage") as "bannerImage",( $imgPath||a."imageName") as "imageName",( $imgPath||a."animationName") as "animationName",( $imgPath||a."stickerName") as "stickerName",c."categoryId",c."payoutAddress",c."sellerFee",c."createdAt",c."updatedAt",a.lat,a.lon,a.price from mv_object_mgmt.assets a inner join mv_object_mgmt.contracts c on a."contractId"=c.id where  c."isActive" =true and a."isActive" =true ${filterParams} ${searchParams} order by ${orderBy} ${order}
getAssetAttributesWithCountByContractId: SELECT "trait_type","value",count(*) as "total" FROM mv_object_mgmt.assets,jsonb_to_recordset(mv_object_mgmt.assets.attributes) AS items("trait_type" text, "value" text) WHERE "contractId"=${contractId} GROUP BY "trait_type","value" ORDER BY "trait_type"
getAssetsByFilter: SELECT DISTINCT "id",CASE WHEN "imageName" IS NULL THEN $defaultImage ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"imageName") end as "imageName",CASE WHEN "animationName" IS NULL THEN $defaultAnimation ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"animationName") end as "animationName",CASE WHEN "stickerName" IS NULL THEN $defaultSticker ELSE CONCAT($defaultPath::text,"stickerName") end as "stickerName","contractId","ownerId","price","assetName","attributes" from mv_object_mgmt.assets ${jsonbParams} WHERE "contractId" =$contractId and "isActive" =true ${searchParams}
